sentences: Sa pead kasutama oma võimalusi ära.
See anned meile võimaluse uuesti alustada.
context: Võimaluse is an Estonian word that means 'opportunity', 'chance', or 'possibility'. It is derived from the root word 'võimalus' which relates to ability and capability. In Estonian grammar, this form appears in various cases depending on its function in a sentence - here it's likely in the partitive case (ending '-e') indicating what one has available.
